title: Persecution of Jewish
common: On this page it is listed the family that has Jewish people persecuted or people that persecute Jewish.

value.name: The Goths
value.desc: during Sisebuto's reign, the Jewish people were forced to become Christian, according to Isidoro of Sevilla.

value.name: The Leme's family
value.desc: during the Afonso V's reign, when Lem Maerten I authorized that his Jewish creditors were sent to Christianity justice.
